short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web interface enhancer for boargamegeek.com site.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
web interface enhancer for boargamegeek.com site.
BGG is known for its inconvenient and ad-infected interface, this extension I've made for myself and my friends to navigate on BGG with ease and comfort.

All feedback is very appreciated.
